Activity: Log in, check emails. Need a strong coffee to end the week.
Review all the work done this week: character blockouts, environment blockout, and basic animations.
Incorporate any feedback received from the concept artist or level designer into the models. Prioritize critical issues that affect proportions or gameplay.
Create a 'basic attack' animation for the first character. Keep it simple and focus on the core mechanics of the attack.
Create a 'hit reaction' animation. This animation should play when the character is hit by an attack.
Lunch Break. Weekend is so close!
Finalize the basic animations for the first character. Clean up any rough edges and ensure that they are game-ready.
@Technical Artist Email the technical artist to discuss the animation pipeline and how to best integrate the animations into the game engine. Topic: Animation Integration and Pipeline Discussion
Prepare a brief presentation showcasing the work done this week. Include screenshots of the character and environment blockouts, as well as the animation reel.
Present the work to the team. Solicit feedback and answer any questions.
Save all the project files and back them up to the server. Clean up the workspace and prepare for the weekend.
